messages.title: UNBLOCK PARLIAMENT : UNLEASH BRITAIN'S POTENTIAL
messages.content: As you may know, I have served Winchester & Chandler's Ford as our MP since 2010 and will be standing for the Conservatives once again on Thursday 12th December.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Ensure a real Brexit, end the European Court of Justice's jurisdiction, introduce an Australian-style points-based system, take back control of laws, and set a path to a future relationship based on friendship and trade.
Negotiate free trade agreements with the EU and the rest of the world, take the UK out of the Customs Union, and strike our own trade deals around the world.
Prepared for a no deal scenario but it is not the objective. If Boris Johnson is elected Prime Minister, he will deliver the deal he has negotiated or leave without a deal if necessary.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Winchester is not a safe seat; every vote counts. There's a great deal at stake and what happens here will play a big part in how it ends so I hope to have your support.

issues.brexitEurope: End the European Court of Justice's jurisdiction, negotiate a Free Trade Agreement with the EU, take back control of UK laws, and take the whole of the UK out of the Customs Union.
issues.economy: Negotiate a Free Trade Agreement with the EU that ensures the UK is in full control of national life including economy, security, and defense.
issues.governance: Ensure a real Brexit where the UK takes back control of its money, borders, and laws and that politicians elected are enforced by UK courts.
issues.immigration: Introduce an Australian-style points-based immigration system.

leaflet.personalStatement: I have served Winchester & Chandler's Ford as our MP since 2010. I voted to trigger Article 50, for all the Withdrawal legislation and I have voted for a Withdrawal Agreement to complete our exit FOUR times now.

politicalExperience.achievements: Voted to trigger Article 50, for all the Withdrawal legislation and for a Withdrawal Agreement to complete the UK's exit.

endorsements.endorsement: The Prime Minister has negotiated a new deal which is a basis for a new relationship based on free trade and friendly cooperation.

quotes.text: The Prime Minister has negotiated a new deal which is a basis for a new relationship based on free trade and friendly cooperation.

images.caption: Steve Brine for a strong and experienced MP

leaflet.additionalNotes: Winchester is not a safe seat; every vote counts. There's a great deal at stake and what happens here will play a big part in how it ends so I hope to have your support.
